title: waited for a long time and  got punished for the waiting
body: I waited for 5 minutes and when I start the queue again riot made me wait for another 5 minutes. srsly?????

replies.body: I looked at your account and wasn't able to find a low-priority queue against your account, so it looks like you worked through this. If you're still seeing LPQ's, please let me know.
LoL NA & OCE are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
